name: ReachShip – Rates, Shipping Label & Shipment Tracking – DHL, Australia Post
author: ReachShip, ELEXtensions

sections.description:
With the ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin, you gain the ability to show real-time shipping rates from top-tier carriers like DHL Express and Australia Post MyPost Business. But that’s not all! Our team is actively expanding our carrier support, so stay tuned for even more options in the future. With this versatile plugin, you’ll find all your shipping requirements met in one place. Say goodbye to shipping hassles and hello to seamless delivery!

With our plugin’s advanced packaging algorithm, items added to the cart will be intelligently packed into the most suitable boxes based on their dimensions. These boxes can be pre-configured to ensure optimal utilization of space. As a result, your shipping rates will be accurately calculated, taking into account the actual volume occupied by the items. Say goodbye to inefficient packing and hello to cost-effective shipping!

In addition, WooCommerce Conditional Shipping / Table Rate Shipping feature helps you to set up your flat rate shipping based on rules & conditions. These rules can be defined on multiple parameters like item, shipping class, cart value, product category, destination address, etc.

The plugin uses ReachShip Multi-Carrier Shipping API to integrate with various Shipping Carriers. With our plugin, you can streamline the creation of shipping labels and display tracking history to WooCommerce admins and customers. You can also automatically email shipment status updates to your customers.

Top Features of ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin

  • Show Real-time Shipping Rates along with Estimated Delivery Date to Your WooCommerce Store Customers.
  • Advanced Parcel Packaging Options – Pack into boxes with weights and dimensions, Pack items based on weight.
  • Print Shipping Labels from WooCommerce Order Admin Page.
  • Schedule Pickup from WooCommerce Order Admin Page.
  • Shipment Tracking with Detailed Transit information within WooCommerce.
  • Option to enable Automatic Label Generation, which auto generates labels immediately after order creation.
  • Option to Add Multiple Accounts for a Carrier.
  • Option to Add Multiple addresses & associate them with Carrier Accounts.
  • Advanced Automated Packing using Box Packing & Weight-based Packing.[Coming Soon]
  • Return Labels.
  • Bulk Operations for Shipment Creation, Pickup Scheduling, etc.
  • Intuitive Dashboard for Reports & Analytics.
  • Conditional Shipping | Table Rate Shipping. [More Details Given Below]
  • Backed with excellent premium support.

Top Features of ReachShip WooCommerce Conditional Table Rate Shipping

Plugin comes with Table Rate Conditional Shipping functionality, which independently works with no API dependencies. You can configure various conditions/rules to set flat shipping rates or shipping carriers / services based on

  • Item / Product added to the Cart
  • Product Category of the items in the cart
  • Total Cart Value of the items in the cart
  • Shipping Class
  • Shipping Destination Address – Country, State & Zip Code

Shipping Carrier Integrations

  • Australia Post – MyPost
  • DHL Express
  • USPS – United States Postal Service [Coming Soon]
  • UPS – United Parcel Service [Coming Soon]
  • FedEx [Coming Soon]

For More Information

For the detailed list of features and details, please visit ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier & Conditional Shipping Product Page.
For more details on ReachShip Multi-Carrier Shipping API, visit ReachShip Multi-Carrier API Documentation Page.
For details on various solutions developed (includes tools from Partners) using ReachShip Multi-Carrier Shipping API, visit ReachShip Multi-Carrier Shipping Page.

Tutorial / Manual

For the detailed documentation on ReachShip, visit Our Knowledge Base Section.
For the detailed documentation of ReachShip API, visit Our API Documentation Section.

Contact Us

For Support / Pre-Sales / Post-Sales questions, contact us through ReachShip Support

Shipping Carriers Supported

The list of Supported Shipping Carriers by ReachShip WooCommerce Multi-Carrier Shipping Plugin. Plugin Supports both Domestic and International Australia Post Services. Few of those services are listed below.

  • Australia Post – MyPost Business
  • DHL Express
  • USPS – Stamps.com [Coming Soon]
  • USPS eVS [Coming Soon]
  • UPS [Coming Soon]
  • FedEx [Coming Soon]

Australia Post MyPost Business Services

Australia Post MyPost Business is a free service that provides a complete range of delivery services for small businesses in Australia that send less than 2,000 parcels a year.
Users can set their preferred payment method (Stored Payment/Credit Account) for creating and charging MyPost orders.
* Express Post
* Parcel Post
* Express Post Flat Rate Box
* Express Post Flat Rate Satchel
* Parcel Post Flat Rate Box
* Parcel Post Flat Rate Satchel
* International Parcels

DHL Express Services

DHL Express is a global leader in international express shipping, offering door-to-door expedited shipment delivery on the next possible business day to more than 220 countries and territories.
* DOMESTIC EXPRESS 12:00
* B2C
* JETLINE
* SPRINTLINE
* EXPRESS EASY
* EUROPACK
* AUTO REVERSALS
* BREAKBULK EXPRESS
* MEDICAL EXPRESS
* EXPRESS WORLDWIDE
* EXPRESS 9:00
* FREIGHT WORLDWIDE
* DOMESTIC ECONOMY SELECT
* ECONOMY SELECT
* DOMESTIC EXPRESS 9:00
* JUMBO BOX
* EXPRESS 10:30
* DOMESTIC EXPRESS
* DOMESTIC EXPRESS 10:30
* GLOBALMAIL BUSINESS
* SAME DAY
* EXPRESS 12:00
* EXPRESS ENVELOPE

About ReachShip

ReachShip is a SaaS-based Multi-Carrier Shipping API platform that helps businesses create and manage shipments by integrating the best shipping options suitable for their business and shipments to their e-commerce store. With a focus on performance, ReachShip provides APIs to obtain shipping rates, print shipping labels, schedule pickups, track shipments, get flat rate boxes, delete shipments, and more. It also suggests packaging options as well as print shipping labels. ReachShip APIs are integrated with multiple leading Shipping Carriers and are committed to incorporating more shipping carriers in the coming future.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce that cater to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support. Our premium extensions are designed to help you manage your store more efficiently and effectively. With our extensions, you can easily manage your shipments, pricing, payments and customer support all in one place. Both ReachShip and ELEXtensions are brands owned by legally registered company Elula Tech Private Limited.
sections.installation:
1. Add a new plugin on the wordpress plugins section and choose the plugin. Or unzip the downloaded plugin zip and Upload it to the folder ‘/wp-content/plugins/’.

  2. Activate the plugin.

  3. That’s it – you can now configure the plugin by going to the settings section.
sections.faq:
After the setup, my site is still saying “There doesn‘t seem to be any available shipping methods”.

You can enable debug in settings and debug messages, from which you will get a clue what is the issue about. Product dimensions and weight is configured correctly. Still having trouble? Please drop an email to us.
sections.changelog:
3.0.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.5
  • Implemented Packaging Algorithms.
  • Fixed Issues.
  • UI/UX Improvements.
  • Australia Post MyPost Business – Supports preferred payment method (Stored Payment/Credit Account)

2.0.1

  • Fixed shipment table creation issue.

2.0.0

  • Tested with WordPress 6.4
  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.3
  • DHL Express Integration.
  • Auto Generate Labels.
  • Generate Return Labels.
  • Upgrading to V2.0.0 includes significant technical improvements including the database architecture change aimed at providing a better user experience.
  • UI/UX Improvements.

1.1.0

  • Tested with WordPress 6.2
  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.9
  • Ability to add shipping address based conditional shipping rule based on regions and zipcodes
  • UI Changes
  • Fixed Issues
  • Incorporated MyPost Business International Changes

1.0.0

  • Initial Version
  • Integrated to Australia Post My Post Business
  • Realtime Shipping Rates & Print Label
  • Schedule pickup & Shipment Tracking
  • Bulk Shipment

short_description: This multi-carrier shipping plugin enables end-to-end automation of WooCommerce shipping by bulk label printing, pickup, packaging & tracking.
